name: for-news
description: 國際新聞幽默解讀平台

scripts.start: node -e "console.log('FOR-NEWS running at http://localhost:8080'); require('http').createServer((req,res)=>{const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');let file=req.url==='/'?'/index.html':req.url;const ext=path.extname(file);const mime={'html':'text/html','js':'application/javascript','css':'text/css','json':'application/json'};try{const data=fs.readFileSync('.'+file);res.writeHead(200,{'Content-Type':mime[ext.substring(1)]||'text/plain'});res.end(data)}catch(e){res.writeHead(404);res.end('Not Found')}}).listen(8080)"

author: FOR-NEWS Team
